title: 有馬記念の後に・敗北後の腹ごなし

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Haaah, I'm starving~.
G1 races really make you hungry.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But... hmm, I couldn't reach it...!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Excuse me, one salt ramen and...
Tannhauser, what'll you have?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: One salt and one soy sauce, please.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Haa... Nature, you're like five times more amazing
than I imagined.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
During the race too, my stomach and back were tingling,
I lost because of the pressure. So frustrating.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
But...
Next time, right? Yeah, next time!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Alright, today I'm eating!
An empty stomach means no racing!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I feel my strength coming back!
